name: Rhythm Rumble
description:
This project was made as part of a class project at the University of Central Florida in Casual Game Production during the Spring of 2018. The build available here is a PC targeted build but there are arcade, and limbitless flex sensor integrated builds in existence.

Credits A Casual Knights Production Sarah CaseExecutive ProducerDaniel DvorakCreative DirectorRyan RosadoProducerPatrick O'RourkeLead ProgrammerKimberly VoProgrammerEmily BannisterLead ArtistAngel MunozArtist Songs Used

Jens East - Galaxies (ft. Diandra Faye)

Jens East  - Nightrise

Fhernando - Funkylicious

Pierlo - Everybody Dance (All Night Luv Garage Edit) feat. Alexia Dee's

Kevin MacLeod - Enter the Party

Ikebe Shakedown - Supermoon

"Special Thanks to Richard Grula and Amanda Beaver from FIEA for allowing us the opportunity to record motion capture and use it for our animations"
